name: AtomBox - Physics Simulator
description:
AtomBox is a piece of simulation software which aims to simulate parts of classical mechanical physics in a visual, interactive, and dynamic way. AtomBox is also a physics sandbox and because of its dynamic nature, it is great for experimenting with different particles and their systems.

Controls

Controls are enclosed in the included PDF too.

Left click - spawn object.

Right click - select spawned object (when mouse is over the object).

D - Increment spawn selection.

A - Decrement spawn selection.

Space - Pause.

R - Restart simulation.

Esc - Quit.
